snippet.title: LEONARDO (AMIGA - FULL GAME)
snippet.description:
Zeus presents Leonardo (un-emulated) for the Amiga, a true classic from the golden era of Amiga gaming which must not be forgotten alongside the software house and all programmers that were involved in making this game.

Year of release: 1988

Meet Leonardo, a thief in the night trying to earn an honest living (cough, cough).
Your goal is to guide Leonardo through 52 different rooms of the mansion and in each room allign the 3 identicle items in vertical or horizontal form to complete the room whilst avoiding the night watchman and the spooky ghost.
Great game, challenging, lovely colourful looking graphics with very nice music, it really is a nice game to have in the collection.

I have to thank "Alpha One" for creating a level skip and infinite lives trainer for me personally so I could achieve this longplay, nice1 buddy!

I hope all you retro game fans enjoy this upload especially enough to subscribe if you haven't already and if you'd like to support my channel then please consider a small donation to my channel via my "Paypal.me" as this will help me to keep up the video uploads and the channel growing (Paypal: https://www.paypal.me/Zeusdaz)

For all your retro machine repair and restoration needs, please contact Mutant Caterpillar Games: https://www.mutant-caterpillar.co.uk/

Please note: NONE of my game uploads are emulated in any way whatsoever, they are 100% original recordings by myself taken directly from the original hardware the game was intended for, that way you know you're watching the real thing.
I will also always state weather i am using any cheats in the game, if not mentioned then I am not using any.
Check out my channel (http://www.youtube.com/user/ZEUSDAZ/v...), dedicated to gamers who loved the games of yesteryear.

Switch to 480p for best video quality and feel free to leave comments on my channel and videos.

Keeping the memory of the Amiga and it's cool games alive!!!
